messages.title: Delivering opportunity for everyone.
messages.content: The Lib Dems will deliver the world-class mental health service you deserve by ending stigma and treating mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

messages.title: REAL ACTION in Ealing North
messages.content: Kevin McNamara and the Ealing Liberal Democrats celebrate the £820 income tax cut we have delivered to the Liberal Democrats in 2010, left the local working families better off and targeting priority areas like Northolt that are in real need.

messages.title: A local champion for Greenford, Cleveland, Northolt, Perivale and Hobbayne
messages.content: Kevin McNamara wants to deliver even more

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems will finish balancing the books so that our children are not saddled with debt. Ensure every child is taught by a qualified teacher and protect the schools budget.
The Lib Dems will deliver the world-class mental health service you deserve by ending stigma and treating mental health with the same urgency as physical health.
The Lib Dems will cut tax for 29 million workers further £400 a year to £480 with your help.
Pass a new Nature Law to protect green spaces and ensure new housing doesn’t compromise the environment.
Pass a new Nature Law to protect green spaces and ensure new housing doesn’t compromise the environment.

issues.economy: The Liberals will cut £400 a year tax to 29 million working people by raising the Personal Allowance to £11,000 with your help.
issues.education: Ensure every child is taught by a qualified teacher and protect the schools budget.
issues.environment: Pass a new Nature Law to protect green spaces and ensure new housing doesn’t compromise the environment.
issues.health: The Lib Dems will deliver the world-class mental health service you deserve.

housing.content: Pass a new Nature Law to protect green spaces and ensure new housing doesn’t compromise the environment.

leaflet.personalStatement: Kevin McNamara: Your local champion for Ealing North.

images.caption: Kevin McNamara in discussion with a constituent.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet focuses on the Liberal Democrat achievements and proposed policies, with a specific focus on education, economy, health, and environment.
